cyclone.name: HARVEY
cyclone.current_location: about 535 miles SSE of Port O'Connor, Texas
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest toward the central Texas coast
cyclone.expected_landfall_location: central Texas coast (near Port O'Connor to Matagorda Bay)

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch: Port Mansfield TX to High Island TX; Hurricane Watch: north of Port Mansfield to San Luis Pass; Tropical Storm Watch: Mouth of the Rio Grande to Port Mansfield and north of San Luis Pass to High Island
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Texas coast from Port Mansfield northward to High Island, with potential impacts extending into southwest Louisiana
